long_description: This extremely lightweight knife features a modified drop-point blade and a smooth AXIS(TM) locking mechanism. Featherweight 154CM stainless-steel blade is strong and sharp enough to slice through food, wire and ropes with ease. The strong, spring-loaded AXIS locking mechanism adjusts smoothly for ease of operation. Ambidextrous blade is keenly unleashed with a simple push of the thumb-stud openers. Resin handle is extremely lightweight and easy to grip. Reversible pocket clip makes storage and carry easy--just clip it on your pocket or belt and go! Silky carrying sheath included.
short_description: This extremely lightweight knife features a modified drop-point blade and a smooth AXIS(TM) locking mechanism.
